00054 #define _ShallowWater1DGetFlowVar_(u,h,v) \
00055   { \
00056     h = u[0]; \
00057     v = u[1] / h; \
00058   }
00059 
00064 #define _ShallowWater1DSetFlux_(f,h,v,g) \
00065   { \
00066     f[0] = (h) * (v); \
00067     f[1] = (h) * (v) * (v) + 0.5 * (g) * (h) * (h); \
00068   }
00069 
00074 #define _ShallowWater1DRoeAverage_(uavg,uL,uR,p) \
00075   { \
00076     double h ,v; \
00077     double hL,vL; \
00078     double hR,vR; \
00079     _ShallowWater1DGetFlowVar_(uL,hL,vL); \
00080     _ShallowWater1DGetFlowVar_(uR,hR,vR); \
00081     h  = 0.5 * (hL + hR); \
00082     v  = (sqrt(hL)*vL + sqrt(hR)*vR) / (sqrt(hL) + sqrt(hR)); \
00083     uavg[0] = h; \
00084     uavg[1] = h*v; \
00085   }
00086 
00093 #define _ShallowWater1DEigenvalues_(u,D,p,dir) \
00094   { \
00095     double h,v,c; \
00096     _ShallowWater1DGetFlowVar_(u,h,v); \
00097     c = sqrt(p->g*h); \
00098     D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = (v+c);  D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;     \
00099     D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = (v-c); \
00100   }
00101 
00106 #define _ShallowWater1DLeftEigenvectors_(u,L,p,dir) \
00107   { \
00108     double R[_MODEL_NVARS_*_MODEL_NVARS_]; \
00109     _ShallowWater1DRightEigenvectors_(u,R,p,dir); \
00110     _MatrixInvert_(R,L,_MODEL_NVARS_); \
00111   }
00112 
00117 #define _ShallowWater1DRightEigenvectors_(u,R,p,dir) \
00118   { \
00119     double h,v,c; \
00120     _ShallowWater1DGetFlowVar_(u,h,v); \
00121     c    = sqrt(p->g*h); \
00122     R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 1.0; \
00123     R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = v+c; \
00124     R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 1.0; \
00125     R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = v-c; \
00126   }
